posts.Title: Qt Designer and Python: Build Your GUI Applications Faster
posts.Description: QT is a dedicated language for desktop applications, so Qt Designer is an extension that allows you to quickly design your application interface to exactly what you need.
posts.Author: jones268

posts.Title: Making Telegram Bots with Python
posts.Description: In this course, you will start creating a bot from scratch, discovering all possible settings to utilize all power of Bot API and creating a real-world application. All this by using Python and Telegram Bot
posts.Author: Gurkirat Singh

posts.Title: Python Virtual Environments tutorial using Virtualenv and Poetry
posts.Description: A mini-guided tutorial showing how to use virtual environment and why it's matters on virtualenv and poetry illustrated examples.
posts.Author: Dmitriy Zub
